TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content: 25. drive a tank through the front door (you can do this in america right?)

Buy a panda suit, stalk people with their shopping trolleys. If one looks, hide and re-appear in front of them. Then topple their shopping trolley all over the ground, and jump on the spillage. (Cookie for correct reference )

25. drive a tank through the front door (you can do this in america right?)

No. Well...maybe in California. But they're mostly idiots there anyway.

Buy a panda suit, stalk people with their shopping trolleys. If one looks, hide and re-appear in front of them. Then topple their shopping trolley all over the ground, and jump on the spillage. (Cookie for correct reference )

Panda cheese!

Panda cheese!

Cookie for you!

Cookie for you!

Yay! *Bro hug*

27: excessive display of affection.
28 . Excessive displays of hatred to wallmart

Excessive displays of anything.

(Except poverty and vagrancy apparently)
Go to the wilderness section, grab a machette and challenge someone to a duel using knives
31: bring in folding chairs and watch the movies they play on all those televisions.

25. drive a tank through the front door (you can do this in america right?)

Sure, you can do almost anything when you're rich.

32: Run along the Canned goods isle and drag your hand across knocking everything down.
33. ask for cannabis (that is legal in a america right?)

33. ask for cannabis (that is legal in a america right?)

Again, only in California.
34 . Walk in with a gun. (is that legal?)

34 . Walk in with a gun. (is that legal?)

Depends whether or not it's a handgun and if they have a concealed firearms permit. And probably whether or not it's visible.
35 . Complain about any aspect of wallmart

Depends whether or not it's a handgun and if they have a concealed firearms permit. And probably whether or not it's visible.

They have so many permits there. Where I live we have a rule against firearms. Basically unless you are a police officer you cannot have a firearm unless you have a hunting licence and then there are many many regulations regarding those.

36. Walk in, buy a videogame, whip out your PS3/X360, hook it up to a display TV and play that game. If someone asks you to leave, say "My parents wanted me to play outside the house, so I came here"
-Play ksp woth their computer.
38.run in naked and lie on a till (this is legal in america? right?)
39. Ask for customer service.
40 . Climb the shelves like a mountain climber.
The 41:st method: By executing a proper brofist.

38.run in naked and lie on a till (this is legal in america? right?)

No. that is not legal at all. You will get arrested for that, See "Streaking".

42. Debate politics with the check out people.
